remoteClasses.name: FaceSegmentatorFilter
remoteClasses.doc: Filter that detects the face characteristics and throws events with the main points.

params.name: mediaPipeline
params.doc: the :rom:cls:`MediaPipeline` to which the filter belongs

properties.name: intervalEventTime
properties.doc: Time (in milliseconds) between two consecutive events

properties.name: x
properties.doc: Position in pixels of X coordinate of the point

properties.name: y
properties.doc: Position in pixels of Y coordinate of the point

properties.name: leftPoint
properties.doc: left coordinate of the region of the face

properties.name: topPoint
properties.doc: top coordinate of the region of the face

properties.name: rightPoint
properties.doc: right coordinate of the region of the face

properties.name: bottomPoint
properties.doc: bottom coordinate of the region of the face

events.name: FacePosition
events.doc: Event generated when a face is detected

properties.name: leftPoint
properties.doc: left coordinate of the region of the mouth

properties.name: centralPoint
properties.doc: central coordinate of the region of the mouth

properties.name: rightPoint
properties.doc: right coordinate of the region of the mouth

events.name: MouthPosition
events.doc: Event generated when a face is detected

properties.name: leftEye
properties.doc: central coordinate of the left eye

properties.name: rightEye
properties.doc: central coordinate of the left eye

events.name: EyesPosition
events.doc: Event generated when a face is detected

events.name: NoisePosition
events.doc: Event generated when a face is detected
